ca.mcgill.hs.plugin
Class TestMagOutputPlugin

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.OutputPlugin
      ca.mcgill.hs.plugin.TestMagOutputPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plugin, java.lang.Runnable
public final class TestMagOutputPlugin
extends OutputPlugin

An example output plugin for testing the sensor data graphing classes. Just collects data from the accelerometer for a short period of time, then displays a notification that allows the operator to view the data and play with the labeling functionality.

onPreferenceChanged

public void onPreferenceChanged()
Description copied from class: OutputPlugin
Signals the plugin that preferences have changed. OutputPlugin objects with preferences should override this method if something changes at runtime when preferences change. If this method is not overridden in a new plugin implementation, the preferences for that plugin will only update the next time the service is started.

Overrides:
onPreferenceChanged in class OutputPlugin
